title: Thunderbird flatpak 115.1 crashes when selecting print
content:
Elementary OS (info in image), Thunderbird 115.1 (info in image), Firefox 116.0.1 (info in image)

Both Firefox and Thunderbird crash when selecting print (info in image).

Current workaround: Open gmail in Chrome and print from Chrome.

All software is the latest versions available within flathub and Elementary AppCentre.
creator: canopus_hp
